key_features: Catches errors in React component tree
Handles server and client component errors
Contextual error messaging for project failures

patterns_discovered: Next.js App Router error handling convention
Componentized error display with flexible props
Separation of global and specific error handling
gotchas_discovered: Global error boundary does not catch errors in root layout
Different error handling strategies for development vs production
Need for custom error messaging based on error type
recommendations: Implement error logging service for production environment
Create more granular error types for specific scenarios
Add accessibility attributes to improve screen reader support
